name: Resort Boss: Golf | Golf Tycoon Management Game
description: Can you turn your cosy, one-hole course into a bustling, world-famous resort? Craft unique courses and build top-class facilities to keep golf’s wealthiest players coming back. Oversee the running of your enterprise, host tournaments and head out onto the course to ensure it’s up-to-par.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Microsoft Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 处理器: Intel Core 2 Duo, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+, 3.2GHz 内存: 2 GB RAM 图形: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, 512 MB or ATI Radeon HD 5670, 512 MB DirectX 版本: 9.0c 网络: 宽带互联网连接 存储空间: 需要 250 MB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Microsoft Windows 7/8/8.1 (64-bit)/10 处理器: Intel Core i5-3470, 3.20GHz or AMD FX-6300, 3.5Ghz 内存: 4 GB RAM 图形: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB DirectX 版本: 10 网络: 宽带互联网连接 存储空间: 需要 1 GB 可用空间
